get.description: Get a list of static host lists

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: JSON filter expression specifying the items to return

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort ordering for returned items

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Zero based offset to start from

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of items to return (1 â€“ 1000)

parameters.name: calculate_count
parameters.description: Whether to calculate the total item count

count.description: Total number of items matching the filter; returned if calculate_count is true

items.description: List of items matching the filter

first.description: URL of first page of results

last.description: URL of last page of results

prev.description: URL of previous page of results

next.description: URL of next page of results

password_prohibit_user_id.description: May not contain User ID or its characters in reversed order

password_prohibit_repeated_chars.description: May not contain repeated character four or more times consecutively

reset_failed_attempts_count.description: Reset failed attempts count and enable those users

id.description: Numeric ID of the local user

user_id.description: Unique user id of the local user

username.description: User name of the local user

role_name.description: Role name of the local user

enabled.description: Flag indicating if the account is enabled

change_pwd_next_login.description: Flag indicating if the password change is required in next login

attributes.description: Additional attributes(key/value pairs) may be stored with the local user account

count.description: Total number of items matching the filter; returned if calculate_count is true

items.description: List of items matching the filter

count.description: Total number of items matching the filter; returned if calculate_count is true

items.description: List of items matching the filter

id.description: Numeric ID of the proxy target

host_name.description: Host name of the proxy target

authentication_port.description: Authentication port of the proxy target

accounting_port.description: Accounting port of the proxy target

secret.description: Shared Secret of the proxy target

count.description: Total number of items matching the filter; returned if calculate_count is true

items.description: List of items matching the filter

id.description: Numeric ID of the network device

ip_address.description: IP or Subnet Address of the network device

radius_secret.description: RADIUS Shared Secret of the network device

tacacs_secret.description: TACACS+ Shared Secret of the network device

vendor_name.description: Vendor Name of the network device

coa_capable.description: Flag indicating if the network device is capable of CoA

coa_port.description: CoA port number of the network device

radsec_enabled.description: Flag indicating if the network device is radSec enabled

attributes.description: Additional attributes(key/value pairs) may be stored with the network device

count.description: Total number of items matching the filter; returned if calculate_count is true

items.description: List of items matching the filter

force_read.description: Enable to always read information from this device

read_arp_info.description: Enable to read ARP table from this device

zone_name.description: Policy Manager Zone name to be associated with the network device

community_string.description: Community string of the network device

auth_key.description: Authentication key of the network device

privacy_key.description: Privacy key of the network device

default_vlan.description: Default VLAN for port when SNMP-enforced session expires

community_string.description: Community string of the network device

auth_key.description: Authentication key of the network device

privacy_key.description: Privacy key of the network device

port.description: SSH/Telnet port number of the network device

username_prompt_regex.description: Username prompt regex of the network device

password_prompt_regex.description: Password prompt regex of the network device

command_prompt_regex.description: Command prompt regex of the network device

enable_prompt_regex.description: Enable prompt regex of the network device

enable_password.description: Enable password of the network device

enabled.description: Flag indicating if the network device is enabled with OnConnect Enforcement. SNMP read configuration and Policy Manager Zone is a must for this to work.

ports.description: Port names used in OnConnect Enforcement in CSV format (e.g. FastEthernet 1/0/10). Use empty string to enable for all ports. Ports determined to be uplink or trunk ports will be ignored.
